review: I am having a lot of fun exploring the applications on the Fire stick. I am having spotting starting and stopping but that is due to my wireless. Be sure you have yours up to speed! I love the PBS, A&E; and History Channel apps. I am not so fond of the ones with a "free trial." I am thinking of getting a game controller, but want to read about others issues with it before buying. Anyway, this hasn't made me cut the cord just yet, but I am that  much closer!
author: Becca "Becca"
